modName: (Bible Black) Hiroko Takashiro Follower - Custom Voice
summary: Custom voice follower Hiroko Takashiro from Bible Black.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://78.media.tumblr.com/67653d72574fdbd7e58127737afabf52/tumblr_p9cq4bcnrg1vd3is0o1_1280.jpg[/img]﻿﻿

[/center][center]﻿- - - FOLLOWER INFO - - - [/center][center] [/center][center]Name: Hiroko Takashiro[/center][center]Race: Imperial[/center][center]Voice type: Custom[/center][center]Body: UNPB/UNPB BBP/UNPB HDT Vagina[/center][center]Weight: 1.0[/center][center]Height: 1.0[/center][center]Combat: Spellsword[/center][center]Marriageable: No[/center][center]Essential: No[/center][center]Location: Solitude, Blue Palace.[/center][center] [/center][center] - - - REQUIREMENTS - - - [/center][center] [/center][center]Skyrim v1.9.32.0.8 or higher[/center][center]SKSE Latest version[/center][center][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/]HDT Physics Extensions[/url]﻿﻿ by HydrogensaysHDT


[size=3][font=Arial][color=#980000]WARNING:[/color][/font]
[/size]Some of the lines said by this follower are a bit explicit 
and could be not of the liking of some people. 



 - - - INSTALL - - - 

1. Install using Mod Organizer (Highly recommended).



[font=Arial][color=#980000][size=3]NOTES:[/size][/color][/font]

[size=3]1- - I haven't tested this mod properly yet. Let me know of any issues you encounter, please.[/size]

 2- - This follower doesn't have a default armor, she's naked in game.

[color=#f1f1f1]3- - If she is not talking or showing dialogue options, save in front of her and reload that save. (This is a bug that happens with custom voiced followers).

[/color][color=#ffff00][size=4]I'm looking for someone who can turn this follower into a Healer/supporter character, send me a private message if you are interested in doing so.

[youtube]-NyWEd2lDW0[/youtube][/size][/color]
